title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 890.27 - Safeguard public interest
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 890.27 - Safeguard public interest

State Regulations

Projects that withdraw underground waters shall be
planned and operated in such manner as will reasonably safeguard the present
and future public interest in the affected water resources. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
890.27

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
